daily_fact: Jamie Dimon expressed his support for NYC mayoral candidate Mamdani, stating he would assist him if he wins the race, showcasing a spirit of collaboration and community engagement in the city.
topline_md: A 76-year-old woman was tragically killed by a flying solar panel during a nor'easter in NYC, while power grid operators warned of potential blackouts next summer, and health officials confirmed the state's first locally acquired chikungunya virus case.
